Author: UHIVESocial
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [ICO] Introducing UHIVE Social Network
Body: Hello All,  Thank you all for the great work and for the support.  The bounty program is closed now! Calculation of the earned tokens will be announced after the crowd sale. We will post detailed information on how to get the tokens.  After we add the stakes for the last week. Bounty queries will be open until  25-9, after that we will not update or reply to any bounty request.  If you have any questions related to the bounty please contact Andy Wilson on Telegram: @AndyUHive (https://t.me/AndyUHive)  It is mandatory to stay in our official Telegram group (https://www.uhive.life)  to know about all the latest updates, app release and tokens distribution.  Thanks, UHIVE Team

Author: ChiNgadOr
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [ICO] Introducing UHIVE Social Network
Body: Two telephones can make only one connection, five can make 10 connections, and twelve can make 66 connections. It is called Metcalfe's law , and is states the effect of a telecommunications network, as proportional to the square of the number of connected users of the system (n2). Now imagine... U-hive, few millions users... take your calculator, do your maths... be smart, get your tokens now at ridiculous price, or regret a few years after in the future!

Author: UHIVESocial
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [ICO] Introducing UHIVE Social Network
Body: UHIVE idea is unique and different from the current social networks as it approaches users with an intriguing experience! We worked in the past couple of years into transforming social networking and taking it into a new era, that combines the technological capabilities (Artificial Intelligence and blockchain) with human psychology to deliver a unique, natural, and entertaining experience!  So, Why UHive Social Network?  1. A new innovative physical dimension which will allow the users to explore spaces in a more intuitive way. 2. UHive Social Network is created based on years of human psychology research, with the aim of addressing human needs. 3. UHive was built from the start to support Virtual Reality. 4. The first social network controlled with A.I. technology. 5. Grey World: where anything goes, a place where users can be totally anonymous!At any time, you can go to the Grey World, which is uncharted infinite space, you can spend hours exploring anonymously and never reach the end of it, you will find new spaces all the time, you can also create your own anonymous space anywhere and start posting. 6. Chatters: You will get the chance to join public discussions and to meet new people from all over the space. 7. Rewards and Salaries: Big portion of our advertisement revenue will be shared with our users. Also, users will be paid rewards (salaries) for their engagements and activities. 8. A new and completely self-sustained economy. It’s not Facebook! 9.Four Years in Research and development, 70 Employees, 15 years experience in creating end users Apps.

Author: UHIVESocial
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [ICO] Introducing UHIVE Social Network
Body: Hello,  Thank you for your interest.   Actually UHIVE is not just a blockchain Social Network, its a Hybrid, consists of 2 worlds, one we called civilized world, and the other is grey world, UHIVE will introduce the world first Physical dimension for the social network, its not just a normal social network, as we spent years creating the idea,then we added the blockchain as a hybrid mode and optional on the grey world, our core is the physical dimension where each user profile will have a location in an infinite space, the UHIVE token is a small part of the social network What differentiate us are 4 things: 1- Physical dimension (Patent pending) 2- Civilized world 3- Grey world 4- Self-sustained economy  For more details check our video : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTYmbFAv8XM&t=1s

Author: ChiNgadOr
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [ICO] Introducing UHIVE Social Network
Body: WWW.UHIVE.IO                              Airdrop: https://www.google.com/url?q=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic%3D3248342.0&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1522936491592000&usg=AFQjCNEevse3akzrnvUtT7bbGscPf7i7nw    ¿Qué es UHive?  UHIVE es la primera red social del mundo con dimensión física y que incorpora tecnología blockchain, combinando tecnología con psicología humana en arras de ofrecer una experiencia de usuario novedosa, notable y exclusiva. Se ha estado desarrollando durante los últimos 3 años, diseñado para dispositivos móviles, y desde sus comienzos teniendo en mente la capacidad de integrar realidad virtual (VR)y de ser impulsada por tecnología de Inteligencia Artificial (AI). El concepto básico deriva de las necesidades y la psicología humanas, aunque adoptando una perspectiva única e innovadora.  1.   Dimensión Física (pendiente de patente): La cual  proporcionará una localización física al espacio del usuario en la red, convirtiendo el descubrimiento y la exploración de usuarios y espacios comerciales en algo mas simple e intuitivo, e incentivando  a las personas a pasar más tiempo en la red. 2.   Mundo Civilizado: Diseñado para personas reales, perfiles reales, navegando por el mundo social de la familia, amigos, socios y compañeros de trabajo en una plataforma regulada. 3.   Mundo Gris (pendiente de patente): Una parte exclusiva de la red social, es un mundo inexplorado y sin control, permitiendo al usuario ser absolutamente anónimo, crear espacios y dar rienda suelta a su imaginación de la forma mas salvaje. Este mundo será creado con nuestra nueva tecnología híbrida de blockchain.   VR y A.I.    El sistema está diseñado desde sus inicios para integrar VR, permitiéndole emplear su dispositivo de realidad virtual para explorar el mundo civilizado y el mundo gris, entrar en los espacios de los usuarios, ver películas, buscar fotos y leer comentarios y artículos de un modo novedoso sin precedentes. Adicionalmente, el sistema está creado sobre una capa de IA, que admitirá la detección de objetos y rostros, análisis de video, detección de sentimientos y análisis de comportamiento, para ofrecer al usuario la mejor experiencia posible.   Privacidad (El mundo gris)  Los usuarios pueden disponer de múltiples perfiles, uno en el mundo civilizado y varios en el mundo gris. El mundo gris se caracteriza por una extrema libertad, enfatizando la privacidad del  usuario, y simultáneamente evita que se cruce la delgada linea que delimita el derecho de las personas a mantener sus actividades y datos privados, respecto del abuso del sistema y la ejecución de actividades ilegales. Para ello contaremos con nuestra vanguardista tecnología de Blockchain híbrida, manteniendo el usuario en todo momento su identidad, datos y actividades totalmente seguros y anónimos.   Ecosistema UHIVE   UHIVE es un proyecto a largo plazo, el cual aspira a seguir innovando e invertir en el futuro de las redes sociales, a partir de la creación de una nueva economía digital sostenible por si misma, donde  integrar el Token de UHIVE. El Token HIVE tiene expectativas de gran éxito, teniendo en cuenta que su valor aumentará de acuerdo a: •    Trading en plataformas de exchange •    Anuncios en la plataforma, los cuales serán pagados en Tokens UHIVE •    No estar bajo el control de un tercero nos posibilita compartir un 50% de nuestros ingresos por anuncios con nuestros usuarios (a modo de salario), lo cual incentiva a participanción y lealtad de los mismos. •    Los usuarios comprarán bienes y servicios dentro de la red social usando Tokens UHIVE De este modo creamos un entorno económico completo, lo cual implica además que a mayor número de usuarios y más demanda, el valor del Token UHIVE seguirá en tendencia alcista.   Suministro y Distribución de Tokens   Suministro total: 80 nillones Cap. Máximo: $52.4M (25 Billones UHIVE) Cap. Mínimo: $10 M Precio del token pre-ICO: $0.0015 Fecha Pre-ICO: 11 de abril - 30 de abril Precio del token ICO: $0.003 ICO Fecha: 2 de mayo - 15 de julio Distribución de tokens: Investigación y desarrollo: 47% Marketing y Relaciones Públicas: 22% Coste Operativo: 11% Legal: 3% Expansión de la red: 9% Reservas: 8%       Todo lo que debes saber sobre la aplicación Uhive en 5 minutos  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTYmbFAv8XM&t=1s  Demostración de la Aplicación UHIVE  https://youtu.be/WCJmopbKY5Q  Nuestra Portavoz de UHIVE  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5BjAjkwvTjc&t=14s   UHIVE Whitepaper https://ico.uhive.io/wp-content/uploads/UHIVE_Whitepaper.pdf   UHIVE 2 Pages Summary https://ico.uhive.io/wp-content/uploads/UHIVE_Summary.pdf   ¿Tiene alguna duda? - Únase a nuestro grupo de telegram

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [ICO] Introducing UHIVE Social Network
Body: Hybrid Social Network UHIVE Kicksoff Pre-TGE and Crowdsale TGE  UHIVE, an innovative new social media network that adopts a hybrid centralized/decentralized concept is close to reaching its next milestone, the launch of the Pre-TGE and Public TGE for their UHIVE token.  A maximum of 3 billion UHIVE tokens will be made available for purchase during the PRE-TGE, which will be from April 11 and April 30th. An additional 14 billion tokens are up for grabs during the Crowdsale TGE from May 2 and July 15th.  During the Crowdsale TGE, UHIVE will also be distributing 3 billion tokens in bonuses for participants, for a maximum of 20 billion tokens released into circulation. The remaining 60 billion tokens (80 billion tokens maximum) are allocated for exchange platforms, the UHIVE team, and company advisors.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/uhive-kicksoff-pre-tge/

Body: UHIVE Social Network: Revolutionizing Social Networking    ●New Experience ● Infinite Possibilities ● Physical Dimension  |Telegram| |Facebook| |Twitter| |Instagram|    Airdrop: https://www.google.com/url?q=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic%3D3248342.0&sa=D&source=hangouts&ust=1522936491592000&usg=AFQjCNEevse3akzrnvUtT7bbGscPf7i7nw    What is UHive?  UHIVE is the world’s first social network with physical dimensions and blockchain technology, combining technology with human psychology to deliver a new, remarkable and unique user experience. It has been in the making for 3 years now, it is mobile based, designed from the start to support virtual reality and powered by A.I., The concept was derived from human needs and psychology, and it has new, unique and innovative concepts.  1.   Physical Dimension (Patent pending): Which will give a physical location to the user’s spaces on the network, making discovering and exploring users and business spaces easier and more intuitive, and it will encourage people to spend more time on the network. 2.   Civilized World: Designed for real people, real profiles, navigate the social world of family, friends, peers & co-workers in a regulated platform. 3.   Grey world (Patent pending): A unique part of the social network, it is an uncharted and an uncontrolled world, it gives users the ability to be completely anonymous, and it will allow users to create spaces and go wild with their imagination. This world will be built on our new hybrid blockchain technology.   VR and A.I.      The system is designed from the start to support VR (Virtual reality), you will be able to put your VR gear and explore the Civilized world and the Grey world, enter users’ spaces, watch movies, browse photos and read comments and article’s in a new and innovative way. Plus, the system is built on a new A.I. layer, which will support object and face detection, video analysis, sentiment detection, and behaviour analysis, to give users the best possible experience.   Privacy (The Grey world)  Users can have multiple profiles, one on the Civilized world and others on the Grey world. The Grey world is designed to bring freedom and to preserve users’ privacy to the maximum, and at the same time, it defines the thin line between people’s right to keep their activities and data private, and between making sure not to abuse the system and create illegal activities. With our innovative Hybrid Blockchain technology, users will have their identity, data, and activities totally secured and anonymous.   UHIVE Ecosystem    UHIVE is a long-term project, it aims to keep innovating and to invest in the future of social networking by creating a new self-sustained digital economy, and by introducing the UHIVE Token. The HIVE Token has high succeeding prospects, as its value will increase with the following: •   Trading on exchange platforms •   All Ads on the platform will be paid in UHIVE Tokens •   Being not controlled by a third party, will enable us to share %50 of our Ads revenue with our users (like a salary) increasing engagement and creating loyalty •   Users will buy commodities and services within social network using UHIVE Tokens This will create a complete circular economy, meaning, with more users, and more demand, the UHIVE Token value will keep increasing.     Token Distribution and Supply  Total supply : 80 Billion Target:$75 million USD Soft cap: No need for a soft cap Learn more: https://www.uhive.life/kb/why-uhive-doesnt-have-a-soft-cap/ Private Sale Start Period :15th July– 15th October 2018. Private Sale Token Price: Contact Us. Crowd sale period: 29thOctober – 11th February 2018. Crowd Sale Token Price: $0.003  Token Distribution:  Research and development: 47%     Marketing and PR: 22% Operational cost:11%   Legal: 3%    Network expansion: 9% Reserves: 8%        Everything about UHIVE App  in 5 Minutes  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTYmbFAv8XM&t=1s  UHIVE App Demo  https://youtu.be/WCJmopbKY5Q  UHIVE Spokesperson  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5BjAjkwvTjc&t=14s   UHIVE Whitepaper https://ico.uhive.io/wp-content/uploads/UHIVE_Whitepaper.pdf   UHIVE 2 Pages Summary https://ico.uhive.io/wp-content/uploads/UHIVE_Summary.pdf   Have any questions? - join telegram

Author: BountyKorea
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [ICO] Introducing UHIVE Social Network
Body: Offering Korean translation for your ICO.  Hello, I appreciate your interest. I am noticing a lot of google translated documents or poorly translated posts in many ICOs websites. So, Check your document for fake or not, for free!  In Blockchain 3.0 age, ICO business can easily cross borders to grow and expand further. It's time you had your website translated into Korean languages to reach more Korea CryptoMarket. And It's Good opportunity if you wants to target Asian markets.  I am a Korean native speaker with a knowledge of english And I'm willing to offer my service as a translator. I have a lot of experience translating ICO websites and whitepapers. I will be able to translate your website / whitepaper / thread / any other content. Besides the translation I may also localize it so it become more readable and understandable for Korean speakers.   Please feel free to contact me by email if you are interested.  kr.transico@gmail.com  P.S : If you want I'll send you my portfolio.  Thank you for your time
